source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers overseas transport and accommodation expenses due to trip cancellation.

For COVID-19 related cancellation: Event must occur after policy purchase & within 30 days before leaving Singapore (unless accidental). Policy must be bought >=3 days before departure (unless accidental). COVID-19 must result in a serious sickness. Must fulfill vaccination/testing requirements.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' maximum.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' maximum.

base_limits.type: Limit for extra expenses to return to Singapore (within overall limit)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers overseas transport and accommodation expenses due to trip shortening.
For COVID-19 related shortening: Pays for unused transport/accommodation. Must fulfill vaccination/testing requirements.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' maximum.

coverage_categories.category_name: Personal Accident and Medical Expenses Benefits

conditional_limits.condition: Accidental death occurring on public transport

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Scale of compensation applies: Accidental death (100%), Permanent total disability (100%), Losing two or more limbs (100%), Losing sight in both eyes (100%), Losing one limb (50%), Losing sight in one eye (50%), Losing speech (50%), Losing hearing (50%). Total compensation from a to h will not exceed the maximum benefit limit.
Coverage applies for accidents during adventurous activities if conditions met (leisure, safety compliance, guidance if available, not excluded). Excludes extreme sports.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 3, Coverage for adventurous activities & Page 10, Note 2

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to their respective age/status limit.

base_limits.type: Adult 70 years old or over (combined for sections 14, 18 and 19)
Limit for medical aids and equipment

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers overseas medical expenses including treatment by Chinese medicine practitioner or chiropractor (subject to Section 16 limits). Includes coverage for treatment relating to COVID-19 while overseas.

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers medical expenses incurred in Singapore after returning from the trip for injury/sickness sustained overseas.
This benefit (Section 15) is excluded from COVID-19 cover.
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to their respective age/status limit.

coverages.coverage_name: Treatment by a Chinese medicine practitioner or a chiropractor

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers treatment incurred during your trip. Refer to policy conditions for specific requirements.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' overall limit.
Payable for each day of hospital confinement overseas.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' overall limit.
Covers evacuation to the nearest medical facility or back to Singapore if medically necessary.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Individual limits apply, including the combined limit for Adults 70+.
Covers repatriation of mortal remains or costs of transport back to Singapore if medically unfit to continue the trip.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Individual limits apply, including the combined limit for Adults 70+.

base_limits.type: Limit for accommodation expenses per room per night

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers travel and accommodation costs for one relative or friend to travel to you if you are hospitalised overseas for a specified period.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' overall limit.

Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' overall limit.

Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' overall limit.

base_limits.type: Limit per item (for each item, set or pair)

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Covers loss or damage to home contents due to burglary or fire while you are overseas on your trip.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' overall limit.
Covers legal liability for accidental injury to third parties or accidental damage to third party property.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' limit.
Covers the excess amount you are liable to pay under the rental agreement if the rental vehicle is lost or damaged.
Benefit limits apply if claim is due to COVID-19 (subject to conditions in Note 10).
Benefit limits apply if policy was purchased after departure (subject to conditions in Note 9).
Family total is the maximum amount for the family cover during one trip. Each insured person is limited to the 'Per insured person' limit.

Provides coverage for 1 or 2 adults (spouses/partners, >=16yrs, parent/legal guardian) and any number of their children (<21yrs, biological/legally adopted/ward). All must be insured under the same policy. Must travel together if insured under single trip plans (not applicable for yearly plans).

Covers recreational activities commonly available to the public, done overseas for leisure/as part of tour. Must comply with safety procedures/rules (e.g., wear equipment). If guides/instructors available, must be under their guidance/supervision. Activity must not be excluded under general exclusions. Examples: scuba diving (Note 6), paddleboarding, white water rafting, skiing, snowboarding, snowmobiling, bungee jumping, skydiving, paragliding, abseiling, hiking, trekking (Note 7), motorcycling, hot air balloon riding.
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 3, Coverage for adventurous activities & Page 10, Note 2

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Excludes extreme sports involving speed, height, danger, high physical exertion, specialized gear or spectacular stunts (competitive or non-competitive, team or individual).
Scuba diving covered if for leisure, holding PADI (or similar) cert diving with certified buddy OR diving with qualified instructor. Max depth per cert, max 30m.

Trekking covered if for leisure, below 4,000m, in public area without restriction OR organised by recognised commercial operator/provider OR under licensed guide/instructor supervision following safety procedures.

Coverage period automatically extended at no extra cost for the first 14 days while overseas if unable to return before policy expiry due to delay of public transport (not caused by you) OR hospitalisation advised by a medical practitioner.
Available for purchase within one day after departing Singapore (only applicable to Per-trip plans).
source_specific_details.source_location: Page 2, Key Benefit 6 & Page 4, Post-departure purchase

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides cover under sections 3 to 27 (except section 8) subject to their respective limits.
Does not cover claims arising from transport taken before/while buying policy, known events, or losses that occurred before policy purchase.
Applies the limits of respective sections (1 to 25 except section 15) to claims arising from COVID-19.

Eligibility requires fulfilling all vaccination, pre-departure tests, and post-arrival tests (if any) imposed by destination country or transport operator at time of trip. Must also fulfill conditions in the relevant section (e.g., Section 1 Cancellation requires COVID-19 to result in serious sickness).

For trip cancellation/shortening due to COVID-19, event must occur after policy purchase & within 30 days before departure (unless accidental). Policy must be bought >=3 days before departure (unless accidental).

conditional_limits.condition: Claim under Sections 1 to 25 due to Terrorism

source_specific_details.detail_snippet: Provides specific limits for claims arising from acts of terrorism under sections 1 to 25. These limits apply instead of the standard section limits when terrorism is the cause.
